# Asgardex V1.40.2 ðŸš€ 
## Release Notes Summary

This release introduces headless and modal migrations, Zcash support, and enhances the user experience with fixes for asset selection, portfolio view bonds route, and updated trade swap tolerance for the new thornode. Technical improvements include typed ERC20 scripts, stricter type checking, and a resolution for bundle conflicts via manual chunking. 

## What's Changed
* feat: headless migration by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/772
* chore: fix asset select and switch button by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/777
* types for erc20 scripts by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/767
* update trade swap tolerance bps for new thornode by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/779
* tighten type checking by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/778
* chore: update bonds route at portfolio view by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/783
* feat: modal migration by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/782
* Add zcash by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/770
* Fix bundle conflict with manual chunk by @hippocampus-web3 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/784
* Chore/update change log by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/786


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.40.1...v1.40.2

# Asgardex v1.40.1  ðŸš€ 

## Main Changes
- **Features & Improvements**
  - Cardano client added for viewing balances and sending transactions
  - Performance improvements with slip tolerance adjustments
  - Enhanced wallet creation flow
  - Updated to React 18.3
  - Updated to electron-builder 24.13
  - Updated social icons
  - Removed styled-components and antd
  - Widened phrase view
  - Removed React.FC generic
  - Updated ledger and xchainjs dependencies
  - Yarn dedupe optimization

- **Bug Fixes**
  - Fixed Mayachain quoting issue
  - Resolved Ledger Mac error
  - Added missing event handlers
  - Small fixes and improvements
